snippet.title: Knight Guy Title Announcement
snippet.description:
In Knight Guy you fight evil doers in a pixel art, 2d, arcade style arena. Use your trusty sword, along with various power ups and moves to defeat evil doers.

to support Knight Guy, donate to me on twitch.tv/hunterdragoonx
for updates follow my twitter twitter.com/Hunter_DragoonX

Shout out to The Epic Eggroll, cash him on his live stream at twitch.tv/theepiceggroll
